title: The Witching Hour
summary:
Key ideas:
- Tal Aivon is on high alert due to an annual event where time jumps backward for one hour.
- The flaw in time was discovered 40 years ago and only the people of Tal Aivon know of it.
- The Lorekeepers of Tal Aivon believe that the Lost World, with all its artifacts and technology, tried to become lords of time but failed.
- Meical Dorn, protagonist and Lorekeeper of Great Rabda, is fearful for his safety and wants to know why Tal Aivon is on high alert.

Key learnings:
- Tal Aivon has six timers that display the True Time to the second while Great Rabda has none.
- The Lost World, a once magnificent civilization, created the sunblessings and other technology used in the present day.
- The gods are stingy with time and would not grant the victories of Man.
- The sins of the Lost World are what ultimately doomed them.

Key questions:
- What happened to the Lost World and why did their magic fail?
- Did the Lost World truly try to become lords of time and if so, why did the gods stop them?
- What other secrets and mysteries does the Great Peninsula hold?
